head.title: Swap pages in {{FileFormatUp}} files using {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to reorder pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Easily modify PDFs, Word files, spreadsheets, presentations, Visio diagrams, images, and more.

header.title: Swap {{FileFormatUp}} pages
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} extends {{EnvNameShort}} applications with advanced document management capabilities. Easily rearrange pages in {{FileFormatUp}} files to structure content exactly as needed.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} capabilities
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a comprehensive document processing library that supports 50+ file formats, including PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Visio diagrams, images, and archives. Integrate it into your applications to merge, split, extract, reorder, swap, and delete pages across various document types.

more_features.title: Advanced document handling
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides a complete set of tools for seamless document modification, supporting over 50 formats.

feature_1.title: Merge different document types
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word files, spreadsheets, presentations, Visio drawings, images, and archive files. Customize the output to match specific requirements.

feature_2.title: Organize document structure
feature_2.content: Rearrange content by moving, swapping, or deleting pages, ensuring documents are well-structured and easy to navigate.

feature_3.title: Adjust page orientation
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between portrait and landscape modes for optimal presentation.

feature_4.title: Extract selected pages
feature_4.content: Choose and extract specific pages or page ranges to create a new, refined document.

formats.title: Rearrange pages in multiple file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file types, giving you full control over document content.

operations.title: Main features
operations.description: Explore the core capabilities of our document processing library.

examples.comment_2: Specify the pages to be swapped
examples.comment_4: Save the modified file to the desired location

content.title: With [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}), you can easily reorganize pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents to enhance readability and structure. Add efficient document processing to your {{EnvName}} applications.
content.step_1: Provide the path to the {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_2: Select the pages to be swapped or reordered.
content.step_3: Apply the appropriate method to modify the document.
content.step_4: Save the updated file to the specified location.

code_1.title: Swap the first and last pages in a {{FileFormatUp}} file
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to swap pages in a {{FileFormatUp}} file in a few simple steps.
code_1.comment_2: Determine the total number of pages
code_1.comment_3: Define swap settings with page numbers
